poem:
Title: "Ode to the Quiet Revolution of Graphene"

Graceful graphene, miracle material thin,
A single layer of atomic kin.
Voiceless but screaming in science's ear,
Of potential yet to be clear.
With strength of steel in humble stretch,
Hexagonal patterns form your sketch.
In pulses of power beyond unseen,
Sing we the praises of gallant graphene.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative.
